summary:
Made a few changes to the players Houscarl of Whiterun, Lydia
She\'s now Khajiit with Two-Handed oriented combat skill and style
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod for myself, but i felt like sharing it.

All I did is change Lydia into a Khajiit and made her use the female animations (standard is male animatione ...Nords, figures)
Further I changed her Combat Class and Style to Melee 2H (standard is Melee 1H) and her outfit. Her outfit is now farm clothes, though I put Steel Armor, Boots, Gauntlets and Greatsword in her inventory so you don\'t have to arm her and can dress her up as you want :3
Oh, and she\'s essential now, she kept running into my arrows <.<

Why did I do this? I LOVE Khajiit and wanted a female marriable follower for  my female Khajiit x3

This Mod WILL most likely conflict with other Mods that alter Lydia or companions in general, I\'m using \"Fixed Followers Lite\" by mangue, it seems to work fine, but I\'m pretty sure it doesn\'t for my Khajitt Lydia

I made her as a dark Khajiit, becaus I liked it that way^^
Hope you enjoy the mod ;)

Feel free to do what ever you want with this Mod, if you upload a changed version, at least give me credit

Credits, in the screenshots you see some Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654]Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set[/url] by Killer Keo
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2995]Beast Race Beautiful CBBE and TnT compatible Textures[/url] by Watshisface
author: kaetzer
